single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet round 1 make 16 chain join this round and every round up to round 13 with a slip stitch round 2 make 3 chain pretending to be a double_crochet and a double_crochet in the joining slip_stitch repeat 2 double_crochet in each stitch 15 times you have 32 double_crochet round 3 make 4 chain pretending to be a double_crochet and a chain repeat double_crochet in the next double_crochet chain 31 times round 4 repeat round 3 round 5 make 5 chain pretending to be a double_crochet and 2 chain repeat double_crochet in the next double_crochet 2 chain 31 times round 6 repeat round 5 round 7 make 6 chain pretending to be a double_crochet and 3 chain repeat double_crochet in the next double_crochet 3 chain 31 times round 8 repeat round 7 round 9 make 7 chain pretending to be a double_crochet and 4 chain repeat double_crochet in the next double_crochet 4 chain 31 times round 10 repeat round 9 round 11 make 3 chain and a double_crochet in the joining slip_stitch then 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain repeat 2 double_crochet in the next double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain 31 times round 12 make 3 chain double_crochet in the second double_crochet of the previous round 4 chain repeat double_crochet double_crochet 4 chain 31 times magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round 13 make 3 chain and 2 double_crochet in the next double_crochet then 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain repeat double_crochet 2 double_crochet in the same stitch 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain 31 times you have 32 groups of 3 double_crochet this was the last round joined with a slip_stitch from now on you will work with row instead of rounds row 14 make 3 chain double_crochet double_crochet repeat 4 chain 3 double_crochet 31 times do not end with 4 chain and do not join you have 32 groups of 3 double_crochet two of the groups are not connected with 4 chain from now on you will have to flip the rug onto the other side before starting each row row 15 turn make an slip_stitch in each double_crochet of the first group then 4 single_crochet in the 4ch-space again an slip_stitch in each double_crochet of the second group and again 4 single_crochet in the 4ch-space this operation will decrease the number of groups by 2 we will make such a decrease in every odd row
